1 import rospy
2 import actionlib
3 from girona_utils.msg import PursuitAction, PursuitGoal
4 from nav_msgs.msg import Path
5 
6 
7 def follow_path_client():
8  # Creates the SimpleActionClient, passing the type of the action
9  client = actionlib.SimpleActionClient("pursuit_controller", PursuitAction)
10 
11  # Waits until the action server has started up and started
12  # listening for goals.
13  print("before the wait")
14  client.wait_for_server()
15  print("after the wait")
16 
17  # Creates a goal to send to the action server.
18  goal = PursuitGoal()
19 
20  goal.path = rospy.wait_for_message("/iauv_motion_planner/path", Path)
21  goal.radius = 0.3
22 
23  # Sends the goal to the action server.
24  client.send_goal(goal)
25 
26  # Waits for the server to finish performing the action.
27  client.wait_for_result()
28 
29  # Prints out the result of executing the action
30  return client.get_result()
31 
32 
33 if __name__ == "__main__":
34  try:
35  # Initializes a rospy node so that the SimpleActionClient can
36  # publish and subscribe over ROS.
37  rospy.init_node("ation_path_test")
38  result = follow_path_client()
39  except rospy.ROSInterruptException:
40  print("program interrupted before completion")
